posts.title: SSIP 2.0 Appreciation Meet
Semicon 2023
Fabrication of Solar Cell
posts.content:
📅 Date of Session: 18th October 2023

📌 Session Title: Fabrication of Solar Cell

👨‍🏫 Expert: Mr. Sandip Joshi, Jr. Engineer, Adani Power Ltd.

👥 No. of Participants: 7

📝 Brief: A hands-on session on solar cell technology, covering photovoltaic principles, material selection, and fabrication processes.

posts.title: Rakhi & Rangoli 2023
Training: Semix, IIT Bombay
Report on Faculty Achievements (2023-24)
posts.content:
The faculty members of Government Polytechnic, Palanpur, continue to excel in academic and research contributions, showcasing their expertise at various national and international platforms. Their achievements serve as an inspiration for students and contribute to the institution's academic reputation.

Faculty Achievements

Paper Presentation at International Conference

  • Faculty Member: Prof. Nirav Jashvantkumar Chauhan
  • Affiliate: Gujarat Technological University
  • Paper Title: "Analysis of Vedic Shaped Microstrip Patch Antenna (MPA) Design for Wireless Applications"
  • Conference: 2nd International Conference on Emerging Trends & Contemporary Practices (ICETCP 2024)
  • Organized by: Atmiya University, India
  • Sponsored by: AICTE & CSIR
  • Date: February 9th-10th, 2024

This paper presentation highlights the faculty’s commitment to cutting-edge research in wireless communication and antenna design. Such contributions enhance the department’s academic excellence and encourage students to engage in research activities.

The department extends heartfelt congratulations to Prof. Nirav Jashvantkumar Chauhan and encourages all faculty members to continue their pursuit of research, innovation, and academic excellence.

Further faculty achievements, including publications, workshops, and research initiatives, will be documented in subsequent reports.

Certificate_Conference_Atmiya UniversityDownload

posts.title: Embedded System
posts.content:
Date of Session: 13th March 2024
Expert: Mr. Vishal Vadher, Assistant Manager Training, SOFCON India Pvt. Ltd.
No. of Participants: 45
Brief: This session provided insights into embedded systems, their role in modern electronics, and real-world applications using microcontrollers.

posts.title: Web Development Technologies
posts.content:
Date of Session: 13th March 2024
Expert: Mr. Vishal Vadher, Assistant Manager Training, SOFCON India Pvt. Ltd.
No. of Participants: 53
Brief: The session introduced key web development technologies, covering front-end and back-end frameworks, responsive design, and career opportunities.
